StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAllCity]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT contry.code AS CountryCode, contry.name AS CountryName, st.code AS StateCode, st.Name AS StateName, ct.code AS CountyCode, ct.Name AS CountyName, c.code AS CityCode, c.name AS CityName FROM MCRISS.USMC.vwCountries contry, MCRISS.USMC.vwStatesWithTerritories st, MCRISS.USMC.vwCoun.es ct, MCRISS.USMC.vwCi.es c WHERE contry.code = 'US' AND st.code = ct.StateCode AND st.code = c.StateCode AND ct.code = c.CountyCode
UNION
SELECT contry.code AS CountryCode, contry.name AS CountryName, NULL AS StateCode, NULL AS StateName, NULL AS CountyCode, NULL AS CountyName, c.code as CityCode, c.name as CityName FROM MCRISS.USMC.vwCountries contry LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.USMC.vwCi.es c ON contry.code = c.StateCode AND contry.code <> 'US' AND c.Name IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY CountryName, StateName, CountyName, CityName
END
